title: Muting Toxic Ping
body:
Hi,

I am tired of people that spam pings in general and when they just spam for toxic reasons.

I would like to see an additional mute button that would be separate from the current mute button. The additional mute feature would only silence the ping but not cancel the visual  effect (or it could also stop  the visual effect, that is up to you Rito).

Cheers

replies.body: You can also turn the ping sound off in the settings, if it gets too bad :)
Just found out today this is actually already a feature!   [Reddit post here.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5ktjcd/psa_you_can_mute_pings_from_allies_with_ignore/)
